answerText: Nausea [or La Nausee][10] This play is a version of the Orestes myth in which the Furies are represented by the title creatures.
heading: 2010 ACF Fall |2010 | Bellarmine and UCLA (1) | 8 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This work tells of a "sweetish sickness" that seems to affect everything around the protagonist, who stays in Bouville. For 10 points each: [10] ] Identify this novel whose characters include one called the "autodidact" and Francoise, who has a relationship with the protagonist Antoine Roquentin.
